Detailed Description

Model object for Diario articles.

Member Function Documentation

DiarioPost::relative_url (  ) 

Provides a relative URL that will be used by the permalink public method.

Subclassers that wish to provide custom permalinks for objects should override this method. You should return the URL portion after the APPLICATION_ROOT part only.

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.

Member Data Documentation

DiarioPost::$foreign_key_name = 'post_id' [protected]

Used to create the name of foreign key column in tables that are in a relationship with the bound table.

foreign_key_name Set this attribute only when the foreign key that references objects of this class is not the canonical name (e.g. 'product' for class Product).

Reimplemented from ActiveRecord.
